assessment_description: End-to-end assessment of SmartFactory cloud analytics capabilities
responses: {"genai_vision_comment": "Stuck on OpenAI API managing 100K+ API calls monthly. Critical issues: no governance, high TCO ($200K+ annually), vendor limitations. Business approved migration to modern Lakehouse - targeting 50% cost reduction.", "coe_structure_comment": "Maintaining 100GB+ logs daily across fragmented Excel cost tracking infrastructure. Daily siloed metrics requiring manual intervention. Team morale low due to technical debt. Executive mandate to modernize platform.", "cost_tracking_comment": "Current setup: custom Python scripts + Azure DevOps with 30+ workspaces. cost overruns causing SLA breaches and business impact. CTO pushing for unified platform - Databricks POC approved for Q1 2026.", "feature_store_comment": "Painful fragmentation: Jupyter notebooks for ingestion, Snowflake for storage, Azure ML for transformation. 15+ model versions scattered across tools. 3-week deployment delays due to lack of integration. Need unified Lakehouse platform.", "value_linkage_comment": "Stuck on Splunk managing 50+ false alerts weekly. Critical issues: siloed metrics, high TCO ($200K+ annually), vendor limitations. Business approved migration to modern Lakehouse - targeting 50% cost reduction.", "value_reviews_comment": "Technical debt accumulating with Grafana. We have 30+ on-call engineers that nobody wants to touch. hidden costs becoming existential risk. Board asking why we can't do real-time analytics like competitors.", "asset_exchange_comment": "Technical debt accumulating with Grafana. We have 500+ CloudWatch alarms that nobody wants to touch. poor visibility becoming existential risk. Board asking why we can't do real-time analytics like competitors.", "data_discovery_comment": "Currently using SQL Server to handle this. assessment_description: Complete maturity assessment for TechCo financial services platform
responses: {"data_prep_comment": "Operations bottleneck with custom Flask APIs - managing 100+ untracked experiments. no experiment tracking limiting our competitive advantage. Cannot support real-time use cases or ML workloads with current architecture.", "genai_vision_comment": "Maintaining 20+ prompt templates across fragmented Azure OpenAI infrastructure. Daily hallucinations requiring manual intervention. Team morale low due to technical debt. Executive mandate to modernize platform.", "ml_ownership_comment": "Legacy SAS environment is hurting productivity. We have 50+ ML models with constant siloed work. Our data engineering team wastes 60% of time troubleshooting instead of delivering value. Need to consolidate to Databricks.", "coe_structure_comment": "Current setup: PagerDuty + email alerts with $50K+ monthly cloud spend. no cost attribution causing SLA breaches and business impact. CTO pushing for unified platform - Databricks POC approved for Q1 2026.", "cost_tracking_comment": "Running outdated shared service accounts with 30+ workspaces. System performance degrading - experiencing security gaps weekly. Maintenance window growing, business getting frustrated. Evaluating Databricks for 10x improvement.", "feature_store_comment": "Multi-vendor cost spiral: R scripts ($120K/year), Snowflake warehouse ($40K/month), on-prem Python licenses ($80K/year). Total: $600K+ annually. Plus 15+ model versions and version chaos. ROI case for Databricks consolidation approved.", "ml_compliance_comment": "Stuck on Azure ML managing 10+ data scientists. Critical issues: siloed work, high TCO ($200K+ annually), vendor limitations. Business approved migration to modern Lakehouse - targeting 50% cost reduction.", "genai_vision_comment": "Legacy custom LLM wrappers environment is hurting productivity. We have 5+ use cases with constant siloed experiments. Our data engineering team wastes 60% of time troubleshooting instead of delivering value. Need unified Lakehouse platform.", "coe_structure_comment": "Running outdated CloudWatch with 10+ disconnected tools. System performance degrading - experiencing hidden costs weekly. Maintenance window growing, business getting frustrated. Evaluating Databricks for 10x improvement.", "cost_tracking_comment": "We rely on Terraform and custom Python scripts for this today. Managing 30+ workspaces manually with significant security gaps. Looking to modernize - current licensing costs $150K/year plus operational overhead.", "feature_store_comment": "Running outdated SageMaker with 10+ data scientists. System performance degrading - experiencing model drift undetected weekly. Maintenance window growing, business getting frustrated. Evaluating Databricks for 10x improvement.", "ml_compliance_comment": "Multi-vendor cost spiral: custom Flask APIs ($120K/year), Snowflake warehouse ($40K/month), Jupyter notebooks licenses ($80K/year). Total: $600K+ annually. Plus 15+ model versions and model drift undetected. ROI case for Databricks consolidation approved.", "value_linkage_comment": "Current setup: Grafana + DataDog with 100GB+ logs daily. hidden costs causing SLA breaches and business impact. CTO pushing for unified platform - Databricks POC approved for Q1 2026.", "value_reviews_comment": "Painful fragmentation: manual log analysis for ingestion, Snowflake for storage, Splunk for transformation. 20+ monitoring dashboards scattered across tools. 2+ hour MTTR due to lack of integration. Need unified Lakehouse platform.", "asset_exchange_comment": "Running outdated DataDog with 30+ on-call engineers. System performance degrading - experiencing poor visibility weekly. assessment_name: Heritage Credit Union Cloud Analytics Assessment 2025
responses: {"data_prep_comment": "Painful fragmentation: Jupyter notebooks for ingestion, Snowflake for storage, custom Flask APIs for transformation. 10+ data scientists scattered across tools. slow iteration cycles due to lack of integration. Need unified Lakehouse platform.", "genai_vision_comment": "Current setup: AWS Bedrock + Hugging Face with 50+ unmanaged API keys. zero ROI tracking causing SLA breaches and business impact. CTO pushing for unified platform - Databricks POC approved for Q1 2026.", "ml_ownership_comment": "Multi-vendor cost spiral: custom Flask APIs ($120K/year), Snowflake warehouse ($40K/month), MLflow OSS licenses ($80K/year). Total: $600K+ annually. Plus 15+ model versions and no experiment tracking. ROI case for Databricks consolidation approved.", "coe_structure_comment": "Currently on PagerDuty which lacks modern capabilities. 50+ false alerts weekly managed through manual processes and scripts. hidden costs preventing us from adopting GenAI and advanced analytics. Migration planning underway.", "cost_tracking_comment": "Running outdated custom Python scripts with 150+ service accounts. System performance degrading - experiencing audit failures weekly. Maintenance window growing, business getting frustrated. Evaluating Databricks for 10x improvement.", "feature_store_comment": "Stuck on custom Flask APIs managing 15+ model versions. Critical issues: no experiment tracking, high TCO ($200K+ annually), vendor limitations. Business approved migration to modern Lakehouse - targeting 50% cost reduction.", "ml_compliance_comment": "Painful fragmentation: R scripts for ingestion, Snowflake for storage, SAS for transformation. 30+ scattered Jupyter notebooks scattered across tools. version chaos due to lack of integration. Need unified Lakehouse platform.", "value_linkage_comment": "We rely on Excel cost tracking and PagerDuty for this today. Managing 30+ on-call engineers manually with significant hidden costs. Looking to modernize - current licensing costs $150K/year plus operational overhead.", "value_reviews_comment": "Multi-vendor cost spiral: DataDog ($120K/year), Snowflake warehouse ($40K/month), New Relic licenses ($80K/year). Total: $600K+ annually. Plus 50+ false alerts weekly and 2+ hour MTTR. ROI case for Databricks consolidation approved.", "asset_exchange_comment": "Maintaining 30+ on-call engineers across fragmented CloudWatch infrastructure. Daily siloed metrics requiring manual intervention. Team morale low due to technical debt. Executive mandate to modernize platform.", "data_discovery_comment": "Painful fragmentation: Oracle for ingestion, Snowflake for storage, MicroStrategy for transformation. 10TB Snowflake warehouse scattered across tools. manual refreshes due to lack of integration. Need unified Lakehouse platform.", "data_prep_future_state": 4, "ml_scalability_comment": "We rely on MLflow OSS and SageMaker for this today.
